content.new: If a GUI plugin tries to access objects/methods in the gui namespace (`GuiIface` or `gui::Events` are common examples), something fails silently and much of the GUI framework appears to fail. Most notably, `gui::Event`s stop firing and translate/scale/ro

issue.title: GUI Plugins accessing GuiIface, gui::Events disables gui functions
